ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: This work was supported by the National Key Research and Development Program of China (2018YFA0507201). The experiments related to SARS-CoV-2 are completed at National Biosafety Laboratory, Wuhan, Chinese Academy of Sciences. We are particularly grateful to Tao Du and Lun Wang from Zhengdian Biosafety Level 3 Laboratory and the running team of the laboratory for their work.
